CHAT.comment: Hesitation phenomena have not been accurately transcribed in this data.

MOT puts all four PCI boxes on the floor after entering the room. CHI shows a preference for PCI box 4. Therefore , there are periods of time throughout this tape where the PCI activities are out of sequence.

u.a: INV opens the door to let in MOT and CHI then leaves the room
CHI walks into the room and looks around
CHI stands in one corner looking across the room
MOT is visible from the waist down . <$=1> MOT walks across the room out of camera range
CHI walks across the room toward MOT then out of camera range briefly
CHI turns around and walks away
MOT turns and walks across the room
<aft> MOT places the boxes on the floor
<bef> CHI walks over to where MOT has placed the boxes . <aft> CHI reaches for a box
MOT places the top box on the floor
CHI stands in front of MOT looking down
MOT slides the other three boxes off to one side . <aft> MOT begins to open a box
CHI looks down then over at the pile of boxes . CHI moves toward the boxes then walks over to MOT
MOT looks up at CHI then down
CHI looks down then runs away from MOT toward the other boxes
CHI walks away from MOT toward the boxes in the corner . <aft> CHI looks down at the boxes
MOT holds the book out toward CHI as she looks at CHI
CHI turns toward MOT while looking down
MOT drops the book back into its box
CHI bends down and looks into the box on the bottom of the pile
MOT looks over her shoulder toward CHI
MOT returns the book box to the top of the pile
CHI bends down and reaches into the box
CHI wants the PCI-House at this point
MOT removes the top boxes off of the house box and moves them to one side
CHI glances across the room then looks down into the box
CHI tries to remove the house from its box
MOT leans over and looks at the box
CHI stands up beside MOT while looking down
MOT starts to take the house out of its box
MOT slides the house out of the box completely
<aft> MOT leans over the house looking down
CHI sits on the floor looking down at the house
CHI sticks his hand in one of the windows of the house
MOT sits behind the house watching CHI
CHI sticks his hand into one of the windows
<bef> MOT moves the house closer to herself
CHI moves closer to the house as he looks down . <aft> CHI looks over his shoulder toward the door
INV explains to MOT that she should do PCI boxes in numerical order
CHI looks at the door then looks at MOT . <aft> CHI looks down at the house
CHI bends over and looks into the house
MOT taps the top of another box then points at the house
<bef> CHI looks over to where MOT taps the box then CHI looks back at the house . <aft> CHI looks at the box
MOT moves the house a bit then begins to open the book box
CHI continues to look at the house
CHI's back is to the camera
CHI looks over his shoulder to where MOT opens the box
CHI turns toward MOT and looks down at the book
MOT looks at CHI as she moves a bit closer to him . <aft> MOT looks down at the book
CHI turns away from MOT and book and looks toward the house
MOT points then turns and looks at CHI
CHI looks at the book then at the house
MOT puts the book away then closes the box
CHI glances up at MOT then looks down at the box
MOT places the puppet on her hand
MOT tickles CHI's face with her puppet
MOT puts a puppet on CHI's hand
CHI leans back and looks up
MOT slides her puppet back on her hand
CHI looks down at puppet on his hand
CHI looks down then up toward MOT
CHI fidgets with the puppet on his hand
CHI lifts his puppet toward MOT's puppet
MOT squeezes her puppet over CHI's puppet
CHI takes the puppet off his hand
MOT pinches CHI's nose with puppet
CHI tosses his puppet into the box
CHI flaps his arms and moves away from MOT . <aft> CHI looks at MOT and taps his face
MOT puts the other puppet on her hand
CHI sits upright as he looks over toward MOT
MOT moves the puppet over to CHI
<$=1> MOT brushes CHI's nose with puppet
<bef> CHI holds his face up toward MOT . CHI waves his arms at the puppet
MOT moves the puppet to CHI's face
MOT holds the other puppet out to CHI
<bef> CHI takes the puppet from MOT . CHI puts the puppet on his hand
MOT squeezes CHI's puppet with her puppet
CHI grabs MOT's puppet with his free hand
CHI looks up at MOT then down by his side
CHI shakes the puppet off his hand
CHI gets up on his knees and leans forward in front of MOT
CHI tosses the puppet into the box
CHI sits back down then points across the room
MOT holds her puppet up in front of CHI
CHI takes the puppet off of MOT's hand and stuffs it in the box
CHI leans across MOT's lap for a new box
CHI leans back and sits down . CHI looks down in the direction of the new box
